projects.name: TLYNT
projects.description: Tylnt is a talent-finding app where a data-driven approach to creative development delivers winning videos across social media. As creative and media-buying experts, we analyze what works for other advertisers, optimize your ads, and continuously test new creatives. projects.name: Kotachi | Coko
projects.description: Kotahi is a powerful tool designed to streamline the review process for teams handling preprints and articles. By saving countless hours of tedious triage work, Kotahi becomes an essential extension to any platform. Its flexible, adaptable, and innovative features make it the only solution that supports the pioneering of the PRC model. Kotahi streamlines review management and workflow for time-sensitive projects.
